summary: Freckled male body textures for the popular male bodies: Better males, SOS, SOS light and it also has an exclusive texture set for S.A.M!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Freckled Textures For Male Bodies[/b][/size]
[size=4] by LadyFiszi
[/size][/color][url=https://flic.kr/p/qbFMfq][img]https://farm9.staticflickr.com/8659/15873488976_720019fb6a_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center][size=3]This is a texture replacement mod for different  male body mods. Adds textures with freckles and moles for the bodies.
[/size][size=3](It is mostly for the ones who don't want to use Racemenu overlays - I'm actually working on it :) Until I'm done, you can test them as this file. In the plugin, there will be more.)[/size][size=3]It's a general replacer, so it replaces all male characters skin textures - except beast races.[/size][size=3] You can choose 3 different body textures: one with moles, one with light and one with dense freckles (see screenshots).
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=4]Requirements:
[/size][size=3]Just the body type you downloading the file for. Don't mix and match them![/size][size=3] 
[/size][size=4]Installation:
[/size][size=3]-For Better males[/size][size=3] Just open the file and drop it in the Skyrim game folder. Overwrite everything (backup older ones first). If you are using a hairy texture, and you want to use the "Body with moles", change your files to a hairless one (because of the hands).
[/size][size=3]-For SOS Light[/size][size=3] Same as in the previous instruction. I retextured the Regular version, I don't know if it fits the Average or Muscular version, you have to find out (I think it should work, if not, let me know).
[/size][size=3]-For SOS[/size][size=3] Open and extract the files in the Skyrim game folder. If you don't want to freckled schlong, dont extract the SOS folder (data/textures/actor/character/SOS). If you are using a hairy version, and you want to use the "Body with moles", change your files to a hairless one (because of the hands and schlong).
[/size][size=3]-For SAM[/size][size=3]I made a texture pack for SAM (moles, 2 lighter, two denser freckled body) with hand and schlong textures. It will replace everything. If you don't want replace all the original textures, copy only the ones you want. You can also rename them (for example malebody_2 > malebody_4, so freckle version 2 will replace hairy version 4).[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=4]Issues

[/size][size=3]None. Small clipping can occur.
The visibility(?) of the freckles depends on the lightning and/or the ENB you are using.[/size][size=3]I was really tired while copying layers, save and rename and structured them, so I might miss or mismatched something. Just let me know!
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=4][b]FAQ

[/b][/size][size=3][i]-No face textures?
[/i][/size][size=3]-None. But if you really want to, I can make some :)

[i]-But what face texture should I use then?[/i]
-Any of your liking. This textures uses the default body texture of their type, so the faces found on Better males page or Fine face textures by Urshi should fit well.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][i]-Why no Racemenu overlays?
[/i][/size][size=3]-I'm currently working on it. This is for the ones who don't want to use Racemenu overlays or can't wait until I finish it. I mostly encourage SAM users to use it, it is mainly for this body replacer mod, but I don't want the other ones left out )
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][i]-Wait, no Favoredsoul body?
[/i][/size][size=3]-No, sorry... Photoshop crushed, when I wanted to export the FS textures.... I have no idea, why. I tried twice. Maybe I will try later.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][i]-Can I use it with Freckle Mania?
[/i][/size][size=3]-Absolutely! FM was made for females, but works perfectly on males too. It has amazing facial textures.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][i]-I don't want all my males have freckles, only my PC/follower/x race!
[/i][/size][size=3]-There are more ways to do then. You can make your character a custom race (don't ask me how), create standalone followers with own body textures (again, don't ask me), or you can try one of this mods (Unique Player is no longer on nexus):
[/size][i][size=3]Everybody is Different
[/size][size=3]Everybody is Different Redone
[/size][/i][size=3][i]Unique Everything.[/i]
[/size][size=3]I haven't try any of them, so don't ask me questions!

[i]-What body mod/enb are you using/What is SAM?[/i]
-ENB is Poupouri ENBs - First seed by Machiimachii (it shows the skin detail amazingly).
 Body mod is SAM - Shape Atlas for Men, a dynamic body system for male characters, the successor of Schlongs of Skyrim. It has 3 highly configurable body shape and 5 different body hair options. Also with schlongs. Google for it!

[/size][center][size=4]That's all, hope you will enjoy it :)
Screenshots are always welcomed![/size][/center]

Credits:
Vectorplexus for SAMVectorplexus,
Smurf and b3lisario for Schlongs of SkyrimChris57 and
Favoredsoul for Better males
author: Lady Fiszi
